tl-codeworks.title: WEB DEVELOPMENT IMMERSIVE
tl-codeworks.content: Challenging bootcamp (8 weeks following a Mo-Sa 12h a day program) with a pre-course and admissions challenge. Included advanced JavaScript and a variety of front-end and back-end frameworks and tools to build full-stack apps. I.a. networking, NodeJS, Angular, React, data structures, algorithms, different databases and unit testing.

tl-gis.title: MSC GEOGRAPHICAL INFORMATION SCIENCES
tl-gis.content: Within my work, I have a high interest for anything spatial. To refresh my geography BSc knowledge, I am following a parttime program which ivolves anything related to maps and geodata. UNIGIS is a program for professionals working the field of GIS with topics such as Advanced GIS (ArcGIS/QGIS), database design and implementation, programming with GIS (Python/Shapely) and geovisualization.

tl-webdev.title: THE WEB DEVELOPMENT BOOTCAMP
tl-webdev.content: Supported my intial process to become a self-taught developer. Including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Express, MongoDB, Bootstrap, NodeJS, user authentication and responsive design.

tl-projectmanager.title: PROJECT MANAGER
tl-projectmanager.content: I.a. as a product owner at Fairchain Foundation was responsible for the development of a transparent chocolate bar, featuring its value chain through blockchain tech. Worked together with UX/UI designers, campaign team and stakeholders such as UNDP.

tl-wecanteen.title: FOOD SCOUT
tl-wecanteen.sub-title: D&B The Facility Group / We Canteen / Amstelveen
tl-wecanteen.content: Responsible for scouting, selecting and coaching of food entrepeneurs. Guided >100 through onboarding process. Developed and executed all intakes, schedules, trainings, audits and evaluations.

tl-kitchenroulette.title: CO-FOUNDER
tl-kitchenroulette.content: Startup with food as the main ingredient: events that bring strangers together, using a self-built algorithm on Ruby on Rails. Responsible for launching a successfull pilot with 11 events for a diverse audience. Coordinated a team of six, an intern and organizers in other cities.

tl-copekcabana.title: BOARD MEMBER
tl-copekcabana.content: Future of community housing (living co-operative) reflected in a project for lower and middle incomes in Amsterdam-Noord.

tl-fps.title: BSC FUTURE PLANET STUDIES
tl-fps.content: Future Planet Studies enables people to become `bridge builders` between disciplines by offering an interdisciplinary perspective on global challenges of this time. I finished with a Major in Human Geography and followed an additional Minor in Environmental Sciences at the University Utrecht (2013).

tl-veerhuis.title: VOLUNTEER COOK
tl-veerhuis.content: Responsible for the residentsâ€™ dinners on a weekly basis.
